TopicTitle: Get in Munar orbit with minimalised rocket. [MechJeb]

Articles.Content:
The challenge is simple, quite easy if you get the tricky part right. (lol, otherwise I wouldn\'t be able to do it)

Enter Mun orbit with the supplied ship. (orbit must not be hyperbolic, may be elliptical, must not escape Mun SOI, no orbits under 2 kilometers)

*Note that I used MechJeb for orbital information, you are free to use it\'s other tools, but they won\'t be of much help (Except maybe KILL ROT)

It is a simple ship, but just a tiny bit tricky to pilot. Smart A.S.S may make it easier to fly, but I haven\'t tried yet.

The leaderboard will be held by MET at the time of screenshot with orbital information, so be quick with that camera (unlike me)

So? Has anyone succeeded? I see 3 downloads of the ship.

EDIT: 04:04:33

Direct Ascent. Could\'ve been a bit faster...

03:58:02

I\'m not using MechJeb. I like this challenge.

Too rich for my blood. I get into kerb\'s orbit but always run out of fuel 3/4 of the way to completing TLI.

When I try to do a continuous burn from ground without ever completing a full orbit around the planet I can never get the timing right.

When I try to do a continuous burn from ground without ever completing a full orbit around the planet I can never get the timing right.

Yep, it\'s all about timing-TLI isn\'t the way to go.
